name: drupal-netbadge
description: Drupal NetBadge with SimpleSAMLphp integration for DDEV and AWS

scripts.build: echo '🔨 Building container...' && docker build -f package/Dockerfile -t drupal-netbadge:latest .
scripts.logs: echo '📋 Showing DDEV logs...' && ddev logs
scripts.clean: echo '🧹 Cleaning up...' && ddev delete -Oy && docker system prune -f
scripts.deploy:config: echo '📋 Available deployment configurations:' && echo '  - package/config/.env.production.example' && echo '  - package/config/.env.development.example' && echo '  - package/deployment/docker-compose.production.yml' && echo '  - package/deployment/kubernetes.yml' && echo '  - package/deployment/ecs-task-definition.json'
scripts.aws:login: echo '🔐 Logging into AWS ECR...' && aws ecr get-login-password --region $AWS_REGION | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin $CONTAINER_REGISTRY
scripts.aws:push: echo '📤 Pushing to ECR...' && docker tag drupal-netbadge:latest $CONTAINER_REGISTRY/drupal-netbadge:latest && docker push $CONTAINER_REGISTRY/drupal-netbadge:latest
scripts.dev:setup: npm run start && npm run sync
scripts.dev:rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run sync
scripts.saml:test: echo '🔐 Testing SAML authentication...' && echo 'Open: https://drupal-netbadge.ddev.site:8443/test-saml.php' && echo 'Admin: https://drupal-netbadge.ddev.site:8443/simplesaml' && echo 'Test users: student/studentpass, staff/staffpass, faculty/facultypass'
scripts.saml:admin: echo '⚙️  Opening SimpleSAMLphp admin...' && echo 'URL: https://drupal-netbadge.ddev.site:8443/simplesaml' && echo 'Password: admin123'
scripts.lint:dockerfile: echo '🔍 Linting Dockerfile...' && docker run --rm -i hadolint/hadolint < package/Dockerfile
scripts.security:scan: echo '🔒 Scanning for security issues...' && docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/src sonatypecommunity/nancy sleuth
scripts.container:health: echo '🏥 Testing container health...' && docker run --rm -d --name drupal-netbadge-test -p 8888:80 drupal-netbadge:latest && sleep 5 && (curl -f http://localhost:8888 > /dev/null 2>&1 && echo '✅ Container health check passed' || echo '❌ Container health check failed') && docker stop drupal-netbadge-test
scripts.postinstall: echo '🎉 Setup complete! Run "npm run help" to see available commands.'
